trans-unit.source: Displays a simple message box with optional timeout.

seg-source.mrk: Displays a simple message box with optional timeout.

target.mrk: Displays a simple message box with optional timeout.

trans-unit.source: The flag indicates the type of message box and the possible button combinations. See remarks.

seg-source.mrk: The flag indicates the type of message box and the possible button combinations.

target.mrk: The flag indicates the type of message box and the possible button combinations.

trans-unit.source: The title of the message box.

seg-source.mrk: The title of the message box.

target.mrk: The title of the message box.

trans-unit.source: The text of the message box.

seg-source.mrk: The text of the message box.

target.mrk: The text of the message box.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Timeout in seconds. After the timeout has elapsed the message box will be automatically closed. The default is 0, which is no timeout.

seg-source.mrk: After the timeout has elapsed the message box will be automatically closed.
The default is 0, which is no timeout.

target.mrk: After the timeout has elapsed the message box will be automatically closed.
The default is 0, which is no timeout.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The window handle to use as the parent for this dialog.

seg-source.mrk: The window handle to use as the parent for this dialog.

target.mrk: The window handle to use as the parent for this dialog.

trans-unit.source: the ID of the button pressed.

seg-source.mrk: the ID of the button pressed.

target.mrk: the ID of the button pressed.

trans-unit.source: $IDTIMEOUT (-1) if the message box timed out.

seg-source.mrk: $IDTIMEOUT (-1) if the message box timed out.

target.mrk: $IDTIMEOUT (-1) if the message box timed out.

trans-unit.source: The flag parameter can be a combination of the following values:

seg-source.mrk: The flag parameter can be a combination of the following values:

target.mrk: The flag parameter can be a combination of the following values:

trans-unit.source: Adds a Help button to the message box. When the user clicks the Help button or presses F1, the system sends a WM_HELP message to the owner.

seg-source.mrk: Adds a Help button to the message box.
When the user clicks the Help button or presses F1, the system sends a WM_HELP message to the owner.

target.mrk: Adds a Help button to the message box.
When the user clicks the Help button or presses F1, the system sends a WM_HELP message to the owner.

trans-unit.source: Information-sign icon consisting of an 'i' in a circle

seg-source.mrk: Information-sign icon consisting of an 'i' in a circle

target.mrk: Information-sign icon consisting of an 'i' in a circle

trans-unit.source: MsgBox() shows on the desktop of the interactive window station.

seg-source.mrk: MsgBox() shows on the desktop of the interactive window station.

target.mrk: MsgBox() shows on the desktop of the interactive window station.

trans-unit.source: Displays message and caption text using right-to-left reading order on Hebrew and Arabic systems.

seg-source.mrk: Displays message and caption text using right-to-left reading order on Hebrew and Arabic systems.

target.mrk: Displays message and caption text using right-to-left reading order on Hebrew and Arabic systems.

trans-unit.source: The message box becomes the foreground window.

seg-source.mrk: The message box becomes the foreground window.

target.mrk: The message box becomes the foreground window.

trans-unit.source: The function displays a message box on the current active desktop, even if there is no user logged on to the computer.

seg-source.mrk: The function displays a message box on the current active desktop, even if there is no user logged on to the computer.

target.mrk: The function displays a message box on the current active desktop, even if there is no user logged on to the computer.

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify a SYSTEMMODAL box with the YES/NO buttons the flag value would be 4096+4 (or 4100) If using hexadecimal flags, that would be 0x1000+0x4 (or 0x1004).

seg-source.mrk: For example, to specify a SYSTEMMODAL box with the YES/NO buttons the flag value would be 4096+4 (or 4100) If using hexadecimal flags, that would be 0x1000+0x4 (or 0x1004).

target.mrk: For example, to specify a SYSTEMMODAL box with the YES/NO buttons the flag value would be 4096+4 (or 4100) If using hexadecimal flags, that would be 0x1000+0x4 (or 0x1004).

trans-unit.source: A message box appears centered on screen and resizes according to the text it contains. However, the title could get truncated if the SYSTEMMODAL flag (4096) is used..

seg-source.mrk: A message box appears centered on screen and resizes according to the text it contains.
However, the title could get truncated if the SYSTEMMODAL flag (4096) is used..

target.mrk: A message box appears centered on screen and resizes according to the text it contains.
However, the title could get truncated if the SYSTEMMODAL flag (4096) is used..

trans-unit.source: If "title" is equal to Default keyword @Scriptname is used

seg-source.mrk: If "title" is equal to Default keyword @Scriptname is used

target.mrk: If "title" is equal to Default keyword @Scriptname is used

trans-unit.source: Special note; MsgBox does not support the use of the timeout parameter when the $MB_SERVICE_NOTIFICATION flag is used when calling MsgBox from a service. The message box window is not owned by the process calling MsgBox when $MB_SERVICE_NOTIFICATION is specified.

seg-source.mrk: Special note; MsgBox does not support the use of the timeout parameter when the $MB_SERVICE_NOTIFICATION flag is used when calling MsgBox from a service.
The message box window is not owned by the process calling MsgBox when $MB_SERVICE_NOTIFICATION is specified.

target.mrk: Special note; MsgBox does not support the use of the timeout parameter when the $MB_SERVICE_NOTIFICATION flag is used when calling MsgBox from a service.
The message box window is not owned by the process calling MsgBox when $MB_SERVICE_NOTIFICATION is specified.

trans-unit.source: This message box will timeout after 10 seconds or select the OK button.

seg-source.mrk: This message box will timeout after 10 seconds or select the OK button.

target.mrk: This message box will timeout after 10 seconds or select the OK button.

trans-unit.source: Display a message box with a nested variable in its text.

target.mrk: Display a message box with a nested variable in its text.
